name: Sunrider's Mother
description: Aye, there, have a look at her. So advanced that the brass needed to train a new line of officers to fly her.
author: Unnamed shuttle pilot

name: The Gold's Blessing
description: Whatever path you choose, know that I will support you every step of the way.
author: [data expunged]

name: Slimy Toughness
description: Viscous, excellent hydraulic properties, oxidation resistance moderate. Shows promise as a lubricant. Source abundant, renewable.
author: hastily scribbled lab notes from undetermined source

name: Swift Gunner
description: I guess only being fast isn't good enough...
author: final transmission of ISS Shimakaze
